name: json-deep-compare
description: A powerful library for comparing JSON objects with support for deep comparison, regex validation, and customizable options

scripts.build: babel src -d dist && babel index.js -o dist/index.js
scripts.minify: for file in dist/*.js dist/**/*.js; do if [ -f "$file" ]; then terser "$file" -c -m -o "$file"; fi; done
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run minify

author: Ashmeet Sehgal (ashmeetsehgal.com)
